name: @keystone-alpha/cypress-project-twitter-login
description: A Keystone demo project for integration testing. See @keystone-alpha/keystone for more.
author: The Keystone Development Team

scripts.start: node -r dotenv-safe/config `yarn bin`/keystone | sed -l -e 's/:\s*undefined\s*,/:null,/g' | tee out.log | pino-colada
